responses.text: Wait, what is this stand for?

dynamic_line: This is the equipment shop. Well, the weapon shop - where already crafted equipments are sold - is unavailable here, but the crafting shop is open anytime!
If you got some materials and want to make new equipments, I'm your man! All you need is materials and money... I can make anything.
To be honest, it's not a stretch to say that hunters wouldn't be able to continue their vocation without my skills.

responses.text: So, you make unique items that I can't do by myself...

dynamic_line: Anyways, if you happen across any new materials, you know where to come.

responses.text: I know now, and thanks for your service.
